column2: Improve messages displayed when a plugin is disabled or not installed

column3: Improve messages displayed when a plugin is disabled or not installed:
File type notification: Change to active (not passive), and properly terminate sentence.
Feature notification: Simplify sentence, and make it more directed towards the action the user can take (current message is very system centric)
@alexander-doroshko generally reviews our work into the Dart plugin - do not know if he's the right reviewer here or not.
Improve messages display when a plugin is disabled or not installed
